items.title: Implement AI Recommendation Engine
items.description: Develop and integrate an AI-based recommendation system to suggest products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System generates at least 5 relevant product recommendations per user session
Recommendations update dynamically based on user interactions within the same session
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing
non_functional: System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent users
Ensure GDPR compliance for user data processing

notes: Assumed that the platform already has a product catalog and user tracking in place; specifics of AI model type and training data sources need clarification.
